message.body: Hey feel like going to ladies night tonight at 280? Ladies drink free light beer and rail drinks from 9 to 11. It would be nice to see your lovely face
Oh man I really do! But tim is making me steak tonight. What are you doing this weekend?
Not sure yet for friday a friend is in town. Sat. Tim and i are having our one year wedding an. So dont know what we will do. But i want to see you
Same! And happy anniversary! Tim leaves for school next weekend so I'm seeing a lot of him so we could hang have brunch or something on Sunday?
Yay :) I love brunch! We'll be in touch then. Love you! And I'm so glad courtney is on the mend
